product_name: SRAM Slickwire XL Road Brake Cable Kit
long_description: Upgrade your braking performance with the SRAM Slickwire XL Road Brake cable kit, which offers slick, minimal-drag performance for excellent braking response. Compatible with cable-actuated road brakes (mechanical disc, linear, cantilever, side-pull caliper). 1.6mm diameter SlickWire stainless-steel cable is coated with PTFE for minimal drag and smooth performance. 5mm compression-free housing is reinforced with Kevlar(R) for lasting performance; housing also has a lubricated liner and flexible end extensions. Kits include cables, housing, short-nosed ferrules, end caps and frame protectors. Please note: compatibility is per the cable lead "head", which is designed for road levers, so this kit will not work with mountain levers.
short_description: Upgrade your braking performance with the SRAM Slickwire XL Road Brake cable kit, which offers slick, minimal-drag performance for excellent braking response.
